page.title: 14The Energy Park Bletchley
page.content: An Energy Park is being built near Milton Keynes Bowl. It is on a 300 acre site bordered by the H6,H7,V4 and V3.When it is completed in the early 1990's it will have homes for 3,100 people and jobs for about 2,000. All of the houses built there will have solar power in the roofs and will not have any gas or electricity at all. The idea is to have one part of the city where everything which helps energy efficiency will be combined.It is the first experiment of its kind in the world. The design of the Park will be based on lowering energy requirements using the existing landscape.They are going to try to create a sheltered environment by lowering the effect of the prevailing West winds with hedges running North to South.
